channel.title: Partner
channel.description:
I need a partner to help me make my server. I am good at coding but I need someone to help me manage all the payments. I need help with the VPS, advertising, etc.
Pm me or post on this topic.
P.S I know this is probably the wrong section but I couldn't find the right place.

item.title: Partner
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Basically you’re begging? Well requesting that sort of thing isn’t allowed, but you can start an actual development team. Note that it should be a DEVELOPMENT team, as in people to help you develop, not just pay the bills.

Read full topic
